com.ultramegasoft.radarchart

Class RadarView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.ultramegasoft.radarchart.RadarView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class RadarView
extends android.view.View
    Custom View to render a simple radar graph with configurable values, labels, and scale. Also supports editing method calls. Can be rotated with animation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  RadarView.RadarViewListener
      Interface for objects to listen for changes to RadarViews.
